{{Infobox broadcasting network |name = RedeTV! |logo = [[Image:Logo Rede TV!.png|250px]] |type = [[Television network]] |branding = |country = [[Brazil]] |available = National (In [[Brazil]]) |founded = 1999 |founder = [[:pt:Amilcare Dallevo|Amilcare Dallevo]] |slogan = ''Primeira em tecnologia HD 3D'' |owner = [[:pt:Grupo TeleTV|Grupo TeleTV]] |key_people =Amilcare Dallevo, Marcelo Carvalho |launch_date = November 15, 1999 |dissolved = |replaced_by = |Picture format = [[480i]] (SD)
[[1080i]] (HDTV and 3D) |former_names = |website = [http://www.redetv.com.br Official web page] }} '''RedeTV!''' is a [[Brazil]]ian [[television network]], owned by Amilcare Dallevo and Marcelo Carvalho. RedeTV! has modern production plants, located in [[Sao Paulo]], [[Rio de Janeiro]], [[Belo Horizonte]], [[Recife]] and [[Fortaleza]]. RedeTV! is headquartered in the ''CTD - Centro de TelevisÃ£o Digital'' (''Digital Television Center'', in English), located in [[Osasco]] ([[SÃ£o Paulo (state)|SP]]), where its news division is based.{{pt icon}} [http://www.redetv.com.br/portal/institucional_central_producao.aspx : Centrais de ProduÃ§Ã£o] ''RedeTV! INSTITUCIONAL''. Retrieved on 2009-09-26. It is the newest television network, among the five major networks in Brazil, being a relaunch of [[Rede Manchete]] in 1999. It was the first network worldwide to be broadcast in 3D. ==History== {{Imageframe|width=130|content=[[Image:RedeTV Microfone.jpg|130px]]|caption=
Microphone RedeTV!
|align=left}} Formed in 1999 using part of [[Rede Manchete]] structure. RedeTV! started its transmissions on November 15, 1999.{{pt icon}} [http://www.museudatv.com.br/historiadasemissoras/redetv.htm Rede TV!] ''PORTAL PRÃ-TV''. Retrieved on 2009-08-23. Its principal shows are [[PÃ¢nico na TV]], the second most famous humour program in Brazil, Superpop, an entertainment program and [[TV Fama]], a program about celebrities.{{pt icon}} [http://www.mundodasnoticias.com.br/2008/09/acesse-o-site-do-tvfama/ Acesse o Site do TvFama] ''Mundo das NotÃ­cias''. Retrieved on 2009-09-09.{{pt icon}} [http://www.tudoemfoco.com.br/super-pop.html Super pop Sobre o Super pop] ''Tudo em Foco''. Retrieved on 2009-09-09. It was responsible for the Brazilian version of [[Desperate Housewives]], Donas de Casa Desesperadas, series exhibited in 2007.{{pt icon}} [http://ofuxico.terra.com.br/materia/noticia/2007/08/16/estreia-de-donas-de-casa-desesperadas-da-5-pontos-a-redetv-56595.htm EstrÃ©ia de Donas de Casa Desesperadas dÃ¡ 5 pontos Ã  RedeTV!] ''oFuxico''. Retrieved on 2009-09-09. The TV programming is directed mostly to the entertainment, with comedy, talk shows, soap operas, audience shows, journalism, sports, TV series and feminine showbizz. RedeTV! was the first since 2008, and remains the only, Brazilian network to produce all of its original programming in [[high-definition television|high definition]].{{pt icon}} [http://idgnow.uol.com.br/telecom/2008/04/07/tv-digital-estreia-em-bh-e-rj-com-transmissao-da-rede-tv/ TV digital estrÃ©ia em BH e RJ, com transmissÃ£o da Rede TV!] ''IDG NOW!''. Retrieved on 2009-09-08. In September 2009, RedeTV! changed its facilities [[Barueri]] for the ''Centro de TelevisÃ£o Digital (CTD)'' in [[Osasco]] ([[SÃ£o Paulo (state)|SP]]).{{pt icon}} [http://google.com/search?q=cache:a55xmhjcA_cJ:www.folhadaregiao.com.br/noticia%3F107724%26PHPSESSID%3D2f1ef7915731d8f+CTD+de+Osasco&cd=8&hl=pt-BR&ct=clnk&gl=br&client=firefox-a Rede TV! de casa nova] ''FOLHA DA REGIÃO''. Retrieved on 2009-09-26. Despite having changed its headquarters to the ''Centro de TelevisÃ£o Digital (CTD)'' in September, the official inauguration of the center was on the 13th of November, being celebrated with a big party and with the participation of politicians, businessmen and artists such as [[Luciana Gimenez]], [[Iris Stefanelli]] and [[Supla]], in addition to President [[Luiz InÃ¡cio Lula da Silva]].{{pt icon}} [http://www.oreporter.com/detalhes.php?id=13679 Presidente Lula participa das comemoraÃ§Ãµes dos 10 anos da RedeTV] ''O RepÃ³rter.'' (November, 2009). Retrieved on 2009-11-16.{{pt icon}} [http://www.caras.com.br/imagens/116375/em/noticias/18177/iris-stefanelli Presidente Lula na festa da Rede TV!] ''Portal CARAS.'' (November, 2009). Retrieved on 2009-11-16. In May 2010, [[PÃ¢nico na TV]] is the first show in the world to do a live 3D transmission in a free-to-pay channel.[http://www.rapidtvnews.com/index.php/another-world-first-for-3d.html Another âworld firstâ for 3D] ''Rapid TVNews.'' (May, 2010).
